articles.author: POLITICO
articles.title: Trump endorsed by head of GOP’s Senate campaign arm
articles.description: Steve Daines becomes the latest, and highest profile, Senator to back the former president.
articles.content:
The head of the Republican’s Senate campaign arm endorsed Donald Trump on Monday, becoming the most high-profile Republican in that chamber to back the former president’s attempt to win back the White House.

articles.description: Steve Daines of Montana, the chairman of the National Republican Senatorial Committee, cited the former president’s accomplishments on issues like immigration.
articles.content:
“That’s absolutely awesome,” Mr. Trump Jr. replied.

articles.author: Yahoo News
articles.title: Why did Tucker Carlson leave Fox News? Here's what we know.
articles.description: Tucker Carlson's six-year run as the host of his own primetime show at Fox News is over, the network announced Monday, ending a chapter made more tenuous by former President Donald Trump's loss in the 2020 election.
articles.content:
Fox personality Tucker Carlson at a media conference in 2017. (Lucas Jackson/Reuters)

articles.title: Donald Trump to visit Scotland next week before heading to Ireland

articles.content:
Former US president Donald Trump is to visit Scotland next week.
